I've been downloading torrents for almost a year and really haven't noticed the +/- until a couple months ago when I started doing my own torrents. Who cares how many minuses there are? It's like email spam and web ads, I just tune them out.

The true measure of a torrent's quality are the number of seeds, well written reviews/comments (both positive and negative), and the overall long term reputation of the up-loader.

I say boycott the +/- system!
I've decided to bite (give this one a try), if only because of Riisa Naka's superficial resemblance to Chiaki Kuriyama.
